summary: WITHOUT ANY SYMPTOMS OR WARNING MY 2012 CHRYSLER 200 EXPERIENCED TOTAL TRANSMISSION FAILURE WHILE DRIVING IN HEAVY CITY TRAFFIC.  WHILE TURNING LEFT AT AN INTERSECTION I LOST ALL GEARS. I WAS NEARLY REAR ENDED BY A CITY BUS.  THE CHRYSLER DEALERSHIP THAT THE CAR WAS TOWED TO STATES THIS IS A COMMON ISSUE WITH THE 200 V6.
